description: This file defines data models (immutable classes) for a food delivery mobile app, including Restaurant, MenuItem, CartItem, Order, and UserProfile.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Represents a restaurant with details such as id, name, cuisine, rating, delivery fee, estimated delivery time, price level, image seed, tags, and menu items.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a menu item belonging to a restaurant, including id, name, description, price, vegetarian indicator, spice level, and image seed.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the user's cart, including menu item id and quantity, with a method to create a copy with updated quantity.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Represents a customer order, including id, restaurant id, list of cart items, subtotal, delivery fee, taxes, total cost, creation date, status, tracking step, and a method to copy with updated status or tracking step.

classes.name: UserProfile
classes.description: Represents user profile information including name, phone, and address, with a method for copying with updated fields and a static demo instance.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the object with optional updated fields, used for CartItem, Order, and UserProfile.
